com.iland.core.web.rest.api

Interface MediaResource

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Serializable

    @Path(value="/media")
 @Produces(value="application/vnd.ilandcloud.api.v0.5+json")
 @Consumes(value="application/vnd.ilandcloud.api.v0.5+json")
public interface MediaResource
extends Serializable
    Media Resource Interface v1.
    Author:
    Cory Snyder

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      CoreTask deleteMedia(String mediaUuid)
      Delete a Media.
      CoreTask deleteMetadata(String mediaUuid, String key)
      Delete a specific piece of metadata associated with a media by its key.
      Media getMedia(String mediaUuid)
      Retrieve media.
      List<Metadata> getMetadata(String mediaUuid)
      Retrieve metadata associated with a media.
      CoreTask updateMedia(String mediaUuid, MediaUpdateSpec spec)
      Update a Media.
      CoreTask updateMetadata(String mediaUuid, List<Metadata> metadata)
      Add / update metadata associated with a media.

    • Method Detail

      • getMedia

        @GET
 @Path(value="/{mediaUuid}")
 @Produces(value="application/vnd.ilandcloud.api.v0.5+json")
Media getMedia(@PathParam(value="mediaUuid")
                                                                                                              String mediaUuid)
        Retrieve media.
        Parameters:
        mediaUuid - media uuid
        Returns:
        media object

      • getMetadata

        @GET
 @Path(value="/{mediaUuid}/metadata")
 @Produces(value="application/vnd.ilandcloud.api.v0.5+json")
List<Metadata> getMetadata(@PathParam(value="mediaUuid")
                                                                                                                                   String mediaUuid)
        Retrieve metadata associated with a media.
        Parameters:
        mediaUuid - media uuid
        Returns:
        list of metadata for the given media

      • updateMetadata

        @PUT
 @Path(value="/{mediaUuid}/metadata")
 @Produces(value="application/vnd.ilandcloud.api.v0.5+json")
 @Consumes(value="application/vnd.ilandcloud.api.v0.5+json")
CoreTask updateMetadata(@PathParam(value="mediaUuid")
                                                                                                                                                                                             String mediaUuid,
                                                                                                                                                                                             List<Metadata> metadata)
        Add / update metadata associated with a media.
        Parameters:
        mediaUuid - media uuid
        metadata - list of metadata
        Returns:
        asynchronous task details

      • deleteMetadata

        @DELETE
 @Path(value="/{mediaUuid}/metadata/{key}")
 @Produces(value="application/vnd.ilandcloud.api.v0.5+json")
CoreTask deleteMetadata(@PathParam(value="mediaUuid")
                                                                                                                                         String mediaUuid,
                                                                                                                                         @PathParam(value="key")
                                                                                                                                         String key)
        Delete a specific piece of metadata associated with a media by its key.
        Parameters:
        mediaUuid - media uuid
        key - metadata key
        Returns:
        asynchronous task details

      • updateMedia

        @PUT
 @Path(value="/{mediaUuid}")
 @Produces(value="application/vnd.ilandcloud.api.v0.5+json")
 @Consumes(value="application/vnd.ilandcloud.api.v0.5+json")
CoreTask updateMedia(@PathParam(value="mediaUuid")
                                                                                                                                                                                 String mediaUuid,
                                                                                                                                                                                 MediaUpdateSpec spec)
        Update a Media. Capable of updating the media name, description and storage profile.
        Parameters:
        mediaUuid - media uuid
        spec - specification for updating media
        Returns:
        asynchronous task details
